channel.title: Eos 317 - Dawn of a New Age
channel.description:
[font=courier new][u]Eos 317 RSPS[/u]
[b]Website[/b]: [url=http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/]Eos 317 RSPS[/url] [b]Desktop Client[/b]: [url=http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/]Resources | Eos-RSPS[/url] [/font][font=courier][b]Web Client[/b]: [url=http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/]Webclient | Eos-RSPS[/url][/font][font=courier new]
[youtube]http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=_h8NbcKTPro[/youtube][/font][font=courier new] [b][u]~ What is "Eos"?[/u][/b] EOS was the rosy-fingered goddess of the dawn. She and her siblings Helios (the Sun) and Selene (the Moon) were numbered amongst the second-generation Titan gods. Eos rose up into the sky from the river Okeanos at the start of each day, and with her rays of light dispersed the mists of night. She was sometimes depicted riding in a golden chariot drawn by winged horses, at other times she was shown borne aloft by her own pair of wings. Eos had an unquenchable desire for handsome young men, some say as the result of a curse laid upon her by the goddess Aphrodite. Her lovers included Orion, Phaethon, Kephalos and Tithonos, three of which she ravished away to distant lands. The Trojan prince Tithonos became her official consort. When the goddess petitioned Zeus for his immortality, she neglected also to request eternal youth. In time he shrivelled up by old age and transformed into a grasshopper.
Eos was closely identified with Hemera, the primordial goddess of day. In some myths--such as the tales of Orion and Kephalos--Eos stood virtually as a non-virginal substitute for Artemis. (source: [url=http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/]EOS : Greek goddess of the dawn ; mythology ; pictures : AURORA[/url])
[u][b]Features List:[/b][/u][/font]
[ul][li][font=courier new]Over 90+ Achievements (Advanced system)[/font][/li] [li][font=courier new]Fully working dupeless Grand Exchange[/font][/li] [li][font=courier new]Lottery system, drawn weekly[/font][/li] [li][font=courier new]Unique Credits System***[/font][/li] [li][font=courier new]Fully Automatic Double-Exp weekends[/font][/li] [li][font=courier new]Great Exp rates, not slow or too fast[/font][/li] [li][font=courier new]Multiple Worlds, Economy and PK (for now)[/font][/li] [li][font=courier new]Unique website with lots of stuff to do[/font][/li] [li][/FONT][/li] [li][font=courier new]Customized Client Login Screen[/font][/li] [li][font=courier new]Now more accurate Combat Levels and Max Hits[/font][/li][/ul] [font=courier new][u][b] Updates:[/b][/u][/font] [font=courier]August 3, 2013[/font]
[ul][li][font=courier new]Combat Level formula was rewritten with a better method, now more accurate[/font][/li] [li][font=courier new]Max hit formula calculated, max hit now has a 2 offset compared to RS[/font][/li] [li][font=courier new]DragonBone armour bonuses reduced to dragon levels (like they're suppose to be)[/font][/li] [li][font=courier new]Added a ::maxhit command to see how you can hit your highest[/font][/li][/ul] [font=courier new]
Media[/font][font=courier new] [img]https://dl.dropboxusercontent.com/u/103983828/screenshots/Screenshot_1.png[/img] [img]https://dl.dropboxusercontent.com/u/103983828/screenshots/Screenshot_2.png[/img] [img]https://dl.dropboxusercontent.com/u/103983828/screenshots/Screenshot_3.png[/img] [img]https://dl.dropboxusercontent.com/u/103983828/screenshots/Screenshot_4.png[/img] [img]https://dl.dropboxusercontent.com/u/103983828/screenshots/Screenshot_5.png[/img] [img]https://dl.dropboxusercontent.com/u/103983828/screenshots/Screenshot_6.png[/img] [img]https://dl.dropboxusercontent.com/u/103983828/screenshots/Screenshot_7.png[/img] [img]https://dl.dropboxusercontent.com/u/103983828/screenshots/Screenshot_8.png[/img] [img]https://dl.dropboxusercontent.com/u/103983828/screenshots/Screenshot_9.png[/img] [img]https://dl.dropboxusercontent.com/u/103983828/screenshots/Screenshot_10.png[/img][/font]

by leech you must mean that ALL server’s are leeched from somewhere. Why doesn’t anyone understand that…
[/quote]
What i mean by leech is, u really didn’t change up alot from the base u used.[/quote]

Well, its a work in progress. Got the client login to support 3 worlds, and added a new feature no one has yet. Adding it to the thread now ^.^

item.title: Eos 317 - Dawn of a New Age
item.dc:creator: @Fox2007 Fox2007
item.description:
@Fox2007 wrote:

[font=courier new]Eos 317 RSPS

Website: Eos 317 RSPS
Desktop Client: Resources | Eos-RSPS
[/font][font=courier]Web Client: Webclient | Eos-RSPS[/font][font=courier new]

[youtube]http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=_h8NbcKTPro[/youtube][/font][font=courier new]
~ What is “Eos”?
EOS was the rosy-fingered goddess of the dawn. She and her siblings Helios (the Sun) and Selene (the Moon) were numbered amongst the second-generation Titan gods. Eos rose up into the sky from the river Okeanos at the start of each day, and with her rays of light dispersed the mists of night. She was sometimes depicted riding in a golden chariot drawn by winged horses, at other times she was shown borne aloft by her own pair of wings. Eos had an unquenchable desire for handsome young men, some say as the result of a curse laid upon her by the goddess Aphrodite. Her lovers included Orion, Phaethon, Kephalos and Tithonos, three of which she ravished away to distant lands. The Trojan prince Tithonos became her official consort. When the goddess petitioned Zeus for his immortality, she neglected also to request eternal youth. In time he shrivelled up by old age and transformed into a grasshopper.

Eos was closely identified with Hemera, the primordial goddess of day. In some myths–such as the tales of Orion and Kephalos–Eos stood virtually as a non-virginal substitute for Artemis.
(source: EOS : Greek goddess of the dawn ; mythology ; pictures : AURORA)

Features List:[/font]

[ul][li][font=courier new]Over 90+ Achievements (Advanced system)[/font][/li]
[li][font=courier new]Fully working dupeless Grand Exchange[/font][/li]
[li][font=courier new]Lottery system, drawn weekly[/font][/li]
[li][font=courier new]Unique Credits System***[/font][/li]
[li][font=courier new]Fully Automatic Double-Exp weekends[/font][/li]
[li][font=courier new]Great Exp rates, not slow or too fast[/font][/li]
[li][font=courier new]Multiple Worlds, Economy and PK (for now)[/font][/li]
[li][font=courier new]Unique website with lots of stuff to do[/font][/li]
[li][/FONT][/li]
[li][font=courier new]Customized Client Login Screen[/font][/li]
[li][font=courier new]Now more accurate Combat Levels and Max Hits[/font][/li][/ul]
[font=courier new]
Updates:[/font]
[font=courier]August 3, 2013[/font]

[ul][li][font=courier new]Combat Level formula was rewritten with a better method, now more accurate[/font][/li]
[li][font=courier new]Max hit formula calculated, max hit now has a 2 offset compared to RS[/font][/li]
[li][font=courier new]DragonBone armour bonuses reduced to dragon levels (like they’re suppose to be)[/font][/li]
[li][font=courier new]Added a ::maxhit command to see how you can hit your highest[/font][/li][/ul]
[font=courier new]

Media[/font][font=courier new]









[/font]

Read full topic
